tests.name: deepMerge should merge overrides into the target object
deepMerge should deep merge overrides into the target object
deepMerge should override arrays without merging them
DirectoryRequireCache should only record the first time (perf optimization)
DirectoryRequireCache should clear recorded children from their respective parent
DirectoryRequireCache should clear recorded separate unique parents
DirectoryRequireCache should not break when clearing a graph
DirectoryRequireCache should not throw when the parent module was unloaded
DirectoryRequireCache should not throw when the parent module is one of the modules to being cleared
DirectoryRequireCache should not clear files from node_modules
DirectoryRequireCache should not fail when recorded file doesn't have a parent
errors errorToString should return empty string if error is undefined
errors errorToString should convert a nodejs Errno error to string
errors errorToString should convert a regular error to string
errors errorToString should convert an error without a stack trace to string
deepFreeze should not change the input object
noopLogger should not enable any logging
noopLogger should not do any actual logging
notEmpty should return true when not null or undefined
notEmpty should return false when null
notEmpty should return false when undefined
stringUtils normalizeWhitespaces should not change strings without consecutive whitespaces
stringUtils normalizeWhitespaces should normalize a string with multiple consecutive spaces
stringUtils normalizeWhitespaces should normalize a string with multiple consecutive spaces, tabs and new lines
stringUtils PropertyPathBuilder should be able to point to a path
stringUtils propertyPath should be able to point to a path
stringUtils escapeRegExpLiteral should return input if no special chars are found
stringUtils escapeRegExp should return input if no special chars are found
stringUtils escapeRegExp should not escape `/` (that's only needed for regex literals)
StrykerError should add inner error to the message
StrykerError should work without an inner error
Task should give access to underlying promise
Task should be able to resolve the underlying promise
Task should be able to reject the underlying promise
Task should be able to know if it isCompleted
ExpirableTask instance should timeout after set period
ExpirableTask instance should be able to resolve within time
ExpirableTask instance should be able to reject within time
ExpirableTask timeout should timeout a promise after a set period
ExpirableTask timeout should remove any nodejs timers when promise resolves
